Kindly review and let me know if you have any questions.Title: Java React Developer with Redux ExperienceLocation: St. Louis, MO - Preferred LocalsMandatory AreasReact DevelopmentWeb ReactNatice ScriptsJavaScriptSCSS Pre-processorAngularJSReduxGitQualifications:Experience: 6 to 9 years in software development.Core React Proficiency: Strong understanding of the core React language and related libraries.Asynchronous Programming: Knowledge of asynchronous programming techniques.React Technologies: Familiarity with ReactJS, TypeScript, jQuery, Redux, and NodeJS.Version Control: Experience using version control systems such as Git.Web Technologies: Strong experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.Testing: Familiarity with Jest for unit testing and SCSS pre-processor.Java: Proficient in Java development.Thanks & Regards JonTechnical Recruiterjon@smarttechlink.com | www.smarttechlink.com
